task_instructions:
You are working on a codebase. Your task is to make the necessary code changes to accomplish the following:

Don't normalize coordinates in GeoTileUtils

The main users of this class use as input latitudes and longitudes read from doc values. These coordinates are always on bounds so there is no point to try to normalise them, more over when this piece of code is in the hot path for aggregations.


Please make all necessary code changes to complete this task.
synthesized_task_instructions: Remove coordinate normalization from GeoTileUtils since the input coordinates from doc values are already within bounds and this is in the hot path for aggregations.
